async.title: Non-strict mode (async)
async.description: By activating this option, rate-limiting is applied in an asynchronous way meaning that the distributed counter value is not strict.

addHeaders.title: Add response headers
addHeaders.description: Add X-Rate-Limit-Limit, X-Rate-Limit-Remaining and X-Rate-Limit-Reset headers in HTTP response

key.title: Key
key.description: Key to identify a consumer against which the rate-limiting will be applied. Leave it empty to use the default behavior (plan/subscription pair). Supports SpEL.

limit.title: (Legacy) Fixed max requests
limit.description: Fixed limit on the number of requests that can be sent.

templatableLimit.title: Max requests
templatableLimit.description: Limit on the number of requests that can be sent. If defined, overrides Fixed max requests. Supports SpEL.
